column4: #mysql is sleeping, can i get some help with mysql here or any other room?
what kind of help you need?
i want to just know what info i get when i export a table structure
can i show you the copy paste
what is the difference of the 'email' between line 5 and 13
there is no difference in the "email" fields in line 5 and 13
in line 5 you create a field called "email" and in line 13 you have set up an index for status_2 to use "email"
I do wonder about the structure of your database... and why there are so many keys in that table
i donno i just exported the table structure
for some reason in the view that i create, only ip works but not email
I'm not sure what you're asking or trying to get help, could you tell me the question again?
well i have a pommo mass email software and it sees in the database to get the email add and all info(this is the structure of that table which pommo looks into)
does it make sense to you up to now?
sort of, I'm not familiar with pommo mass software
so what i m creating is a view of that table so that i dont have to import all email from another database
you should use a gui interface like phpmyadmin if you are not and make sure that you export only what you need in the export tab
i m so confused and i dont know how to put the question, i wll talk to u later - thanks for offering your help
